name: Malaysia Coronavirus Statistics
special_instructions: Email is required for the tool to function properly. If not provided, the tool will return an error.
The tool provides hourly updates on the statistics. If you need real-time data, please consider this factor.
The tool fetches data from the official Malaysia statistics and worldometers.info. If these sources are down, the tool might not function as expected.
The tool does not provide any options to filter the data. It returns the complete statistics available at the time of the request.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
